tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE incoming_leads (
    lead_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    lead_contact VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    lead_source VARCHAR(50),
    lead_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'New',
    lead_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE incoming_leads (
id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
lead_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
lead_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
lead_phone VARCHAR(20),
lead_message TEXT,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE client_communications (
communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
client_id INT NOT NULL,
communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
communication_date DATE NOT NULL,
communication_details TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES incoming_leads(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
    lead_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    lead_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    lead_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    lead_source VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Communications (
    communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT NOT NULL,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Agents (
    agent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    agent_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    agent_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    agent_office VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name STRING,
    lead_email STRING,
    lead_phone STRING,
    lead_source STRING,
    lead_status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    comm_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    comm_type STRING,
    comm_date TIMESTAMP,
    lead_id UUID REFERENCES leads (lead_id),
    comm_content STRING
);

CREATE TABLE agents (
    agent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name STRING,
    agent_email STRING,
    agent_phone STRING,
    agent_agency STRING
);

CREATE TABLE properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address STRING,
    property_type STRING,
    property_price DECIMAL,
    agent_id UUID REFERENCES agents (agent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50),
    lead_email VARCHAR(50),
    lead_phone VARCHAR(15),
    lead_source VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    client_email VARCHAR(50),
    client_phone VARCHAR(15),
    lead_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES leads(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date DATE,
    log_time TIME,
    log_type VARCHAR(20),
    log_description TEXT,
    client_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agent_assigned_leads (
    lead_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (lead_id, agent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES leads(lead_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id)
);
